title: Forgot my E-mail...
body:
Hello, guys, i tryed to change my pass, but its seems i must get a pin, at my e-mail, but i`ve forgot it, so what must i write to the support and what?
Please help me, i must change my password.

replies.body: The pin is sent to your registered email to help prevent cases of unauthorized access.  We can help with recovering your account and changing your email through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Reach out to us there, and we'll help with your specific issue individually.  We'll respond asap!
